title: Daredevil v2 109-119 + 500-512 (2008-2010)
description:
English | CBR and CBZ | 24 Issues

Daredevil v2 #109-119 and #500-512
Publisher:  Marvel
Publication Date:  July 23, 2008 - December 1, 2010

Writers:  Ed Brubaker (#109-119, 500), Greg Rucka (#109-110), Andy Diggle (#500-512), Ann Nocenti (#500), Frank Miller (#191, reprinted in #500), Anthony Johnston (#505-510, 512)

Pencilers:  Michael Lark (#109-110, 112-115, 117-199, 500), Clay Mann (#111), Tonci Zonjic (#115), David Aja (#116, 500), John Lucas (#118), Klaus Janson (#500), Chris Samnee (#500), Paul Azaceta (#500), Billy Tan (#500), Frank Miller (#191, reprinted in #500), Roberto De La Torre (#501-504), Marco Checchetto (#503, 505-512), 

Inkers:  Stefano Gaudiano (#109-119, 500), Klaus Janson (#500), Chris Samnee (#500), Paul Azaceta (#500), Matt Banning (#500), David Aja (#500), Terry Austin (#191, reprinted in #500), Roberto De La Torre (#501-504), Marco Checchetto (#503, 505-512)

Colorists:  Matt Hollingsworth (#109-115, 116-119, 500-512), Jose Villarrubia (#116), Justin Ponsor (#500), Lynn Varley (#191, reprinted in #500)

Letterers:  Chris Eliopoulos (#109-119, 500), Joe Caramagna (#500-512), Joe Rosen (#191, reprinted in #500)

Cover Artists:  Marko Djurdjevic (#109-119, 500-), Alex Ross (#500), Geof Darrow (#500), Gabriele Dell'Otto (#500), Patrick Zircher (#500), Jim Cheung (#500), Esad Ribic (#501-504), Paolo Rivera (#505-507), John Cassaday and Laura Martin (#508-512)

Daredevil v2 #109
Why does Big Ben want to be executed for a crime he probably didn't commit? And why does the government want Dakota and Matt Murdock off the case? Questions and conspiracies abound!

Daredevil v2 #110
Daredevil and Dakota North have discovered the truth about Big Ben Donovan's death sentence...but will the truth set any of them free?

Daredevil v2 #111-115 - Lady Bullseye story arc
Be there when Matt Murdock first encounters a shocking new face -- Lady Bullseye! Who is she? Where did she come from? What does she want? And will she be a foe to Daredevil...or a friend? 

Daredevil v2 #116-119, 500 - Return of the King story arc
Nearly two years ago, the Kingpin left America to build a new life and find a new purpose. Is that new life now coming to the attention of old enemies? And how does this connect to Matt Murdock and his troubles in New York with Lady Bullseye?

Daredevil v2 #501-507 - Devil's Hand story arc
Meet Daredevil as you've never seen him before! Cataclysmic events have left Matt in the toughest place of his life -- and forced him to make the hardest decision he's ever made.

Daredevil v2 #508-512 - Shadowland story arc
SHADOWLAND Tie-in Matt Murdock has long played judge and jury to criminals as Daredevil, but has he now become executioner as well?!

Thanks goes to Empire, Locke, Zack, DTs, Revolver, Roca-X, ThosTew, Goblin, Meganubis, MustacheGuy, Twiztid, Bertha, and ScanDog for this release.
